content: curl-up in the luxurious feel of this chunky crochet blanket made cheerful using bernat baby blanket calico the classic chenille-style of this yarn brings those wonderful bubbles alive with texture while the fun variegate makes each stitch look unique learn chain double_crochet single_crochet and more on this easy-to-make throw that s an effortless choice for any gifting project materials bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 ds/201 m sunset 04927 5 balls or 933 yds/853 m measurements approximately approx 42 x 52 106 5 x 132 cm
